name: StoryDreamLover
0:
”Alexa, open story dream lover”
”Alexa, start story dream lover”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: story dream lover
des:
Once upon a time, there was a person who had the power to enter other people’s dreams. They could explore the deepest corners of the human mind and experience the most fantastic adventures. One night, they entered the dream of a young girl who was lost in a dark forest. The person used their powers to guide her through the forest, helping her overcome her fears and find her way home. Another time, they entered the dream of an old man who was reliving his youth. Together, they traveled back in time and experienced the joys and sorrows of his past. As the person traveled from dream to dream, they learned more about the human condition and the power of the mind. They saw the beauty and wonder of the world through the eyes of others and gained a deeper understanding of themselves.
In the end, the person realized that their adventures in the dream world had changed them forever. They had become wiser, kinder, and more compassionate. And so, they continued to explore the dreams of others, always seeking new adventures and new insights into the human experience.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
